NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Friends, I have delivered two new memory statues aboard the <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab!</color>
2
1
PRIVET: You have my thanks, Cycad. I am impressed by Phlox's speed in sculpting these new statues!
3
1
PRIVET: With the help of these statues, we should be able to pair to the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> to begin studying the negative time interval.
4
3
CYCAD: I have heard about the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station,</color> but why would being paired to it allow one to study the negative time interval, Privet?
5
4
PRIVET: It is quite simple! The <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> powers a 6-second negative time interval using energy from <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep's</color> electric core.
6
5
PRIVET: We have been using this shorter interval to test the mechanisms of a negative time interval.. It was during one such interval that Spire discovered the discrepancy we are studying here!
7
6
CYCAD: I see.. What a wise plan! This shorter interval will allow us to ensure the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is theoretically sound before its operation.
8
7
CYCAD: I must return to <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> shortly.. I shall look forward to visiting the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> while there!
Workshop R3 8
